title: New: Kodak To Graph – Rakshasa (Feat. Monsoonsiren)
content:
Rapidly becoming a household name, Kodak To Graph is one of the most vibrant young producers around at the present moment.

On his latest track, Rakshasa (a Hindu term for an unrighteous spirit – or man-eater) which features the vocal talents of Monsoonsiren, he experiments with splicing up numerous samples, all that ultimately inject a real life and energy into the composition. In terms of what Kodak To Graph is achieving at the moment, there are few doing it better.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
